mapper.sql: ID, NAME, LIFETIME_MIN, LIFETIME_MAN, FATHER_RACE_ID, MOTHER_RACEID
mapper.insert:
insert into race
ID,
NAME,
LIFETIME_MIN,
LIFETIME_MAN,
FATHER_RACE_ID,
MOTHER_RACEID,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update race
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIFETIME_MIN = #{lifetimeMin,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LIFETIME_MAN = #{lifetimeMan,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FATHER_RACE_ID = #{fatherRaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MOTHER_RACEID = #{motherRaceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update race set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIFETIME_MIN = #{lifetimeMin,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LIFETIME_MAN = #{lifetimeMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FATHER_RACE_ID = #{fatherRaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MOTHER_RACEID = #{motherRaceid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
